data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Mariehamn, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mariehamn, Åland
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Mariehamn, Åland to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Mariehamn, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Mariehamn, Åland to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Mariehamn, Åland to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Mariehamn to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Spirit, encourage the church in Mariehamn, Åland to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mariehamn, Åland has a population of 11,700.

We estimate Mariehamn has 140 people who might know Jesus, 11,478 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 82 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 83 neighbors who need Jesus.
